TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void NetworkAvailabilityChangedEventHandler(object sender, NetworkAvailabilityEventArgs e);
.class public auto ansi sealed NetworkAvailabilityChangedEventHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate
Public Delegate Sub NetworkAvailabilityChangedEventHandler(sender As Object, e As NetworkAvailabilityEventArgs)
public delegate void NetworkAvailabilityChangedEventHandler(System::Object ^ sender, NetworkAvailabilityEventArgs ^ e);

param.name: e
param.span: Objeto que contiene datos sobre el evento.

span.span: An object that contains data about the event.

summary.span: Hace referencia a uno o varios métodos a los que hay que llamar cuando cambia la disponibilidad de la red.

span.span: References one or more methods to be called when the availability of the network changes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Este delegado controla eventos provocados por la clase.This delegate handles events raised by the class. Para obtener información detallada al recibir la notificación de dirección de la interfaz de red de los eventos de cambio, consulte el documentación de información general de la clase.For detailed information on receiving notification for network interface address change events, see the class overview documentation. El eventos se admiten en Windows 2000 y versiones posteriores.The event is supported on Windows 2000 and later.
